name: The Penguins of Madagascar: Dr. Blowhole Returns - Again!
name_original: The Penguins of Madagascar: Dr. Blowhole Returns - Again!
description:
The Penguins of Madagascar: Dr. Blowhole Returns - Again! is an arcade-platformer game developed by Griptonite Games. It was originally released in 2011. THQ published the game.
The Penguins of Madagascar: Dr. Blowhole Returns - Again! is available on PlayStation 3 and Wii. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop.
